Marketing Information: ViewSonic's new 22-inch VA2251m is eco-friendly and produces a Full HD 1080p viewing experience. Featuring a widescreen Full HD 1080p 1920 x 1080 resolution, the VA2251m series delivers crisp images for work and home environments. An incorporated LED backlight as well as a power-saving ECO-mode produces higher levels of brightness and refines image details even in low light conditions. Reducing power consumption with three different brightness throughputs, helps to save on energy and accommodate different environments. Built-in sRGB color correction technology and dynamic contrast ratio also manage pixel quality to the finest detail and produces a great viewing experience.
